alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 10:45PM MDT until March 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the Bighorn Mountains and 2 to 4 inches elsewhere. Northwest wind 15 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains, and the Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become more difficult after sunset Saturday, especially over Powder River Pass, Granite Pass, and through Wind River Canyon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will end earlier in the Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains, generally by early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains
